data.Title: Google Search Console Performance Reports Fixed After Delay
data.Description: Google Search Console Performance reports are now all caught up after a long significant delay. The data for the reports was still catching up and being reprocessed, with partial data initially displayed. This is expected with data recoveries, and the partial data will be replaced with final data.

data.Title: Google Search Console URL Inspection Tool Does Not Change Canonicalization
data.Description: Google's John Mueller said that using the request indexing feature in Google Search Console's URL Inspection Tool does not change canonicalization. The question that was asked is if it can help speed up URL removal for a 301 redirected URL.

data.Title: Redirect Your Main Robots.txt to Your CDN's Robots.txt
data.Description: You can redirect your main robots.txt to your CDN's robots.txt and manage it only there so you don't need to manage two robots.txt files, Google explains. Google's John Mueller says if you are using a CDN you can redirect your www version to the CDN and manage robots.txt there.

data.Title: Google Updates Image SEO Best Practices
data.Description: Google image SEO best practices "Use HTML image elements to embed images" section was updated.

data.Title: Google Search Tests Wider Search Bar
data.Description: ICYMI: Google Search tests a wider search bar.

data.Title: Cloudflare Launches Tool to Block AI Crawlers
data.Description: Cloudflare launches a tool that aims to block bots from scraping websites for AI training data, available free for all customers.

data.Title: Reddit Does Not Block Google Search
data.Description: Despite rumors, Reddit confirms it is not blocking Google Search from crawling and indexing its content, ensuring continued visibility in search results.

data.Title: OpenAI Updates ChatGPT macOS App with Local Encryption
data.Description: OpenAI releases an update for its ChatGPT macOS app, enabling local encryption of conversations following a discovery of plain text storage vulnerability.
